title: Pipeline Observability
description: This schema defines pipeline observability data that can be associated with data assets to track pipeline execution information.

pipeline.description: Reference to the pipeline that processes this data asset.

scheduleInterval.description: Schedule interval for the pipeline in cron format.

startTime.description: Start time of the pipeline schedule.

endTime.description: End time of the pipeline schedule.

lastRunTime.description: Timestamp of the last pipeline execution.

lastRunStatus.description: Status of the last pipeline execution.
